ygData.msgSnippet: Thanks to the work of Murlock (http://www.murlock.org), Openglad runs under Windows. The Windows binaries are available at http://snowstorm.sourceforge.net or

Subject: Openglad 0.9 (Windows binaries) released!

Thanks to the work of Murlock (http://www.murlock.org), Openglad runs
under Windows. The Windows binaries are available at
http://snowstorm.sourceforge.net or
http://sourceforge.net/projects/snowstorm

They don't run quite as well as the Linux versions, but they run pretty
well. The only feature that didn't work for me was fullscreen mode (of
course, the machine I tested this on didn't have speakers or joysticks, so
those may or may not work).

- Zardus
